title: Hovercraft
creator_credit: John Read, Brith Broadcasting Corporation and Peter Bennet Stone
brief_description: The story of Christopher Cockerell and of his invention, the Hovercraft. Tells how he developed the principle while running a small boatyard on the Norfolk Broads and how after many attempts the idea was adapted by industry. Describes the construction and operation of the latest British Hovercraft made by four different firms, and a high speed journey along the coast of the Isle of Wight.
